description:
Description

Introducing Deep Vita C Pads, a game-changing addition to your skincare routine, specially crafted to address the distinctive needs of both acne-prone and dull skin..
Over a 4-week period, a remarkable *100% of participants witnessed improvements in pigmentation, dark spots, exfoliation, hydration, and skin radiance..

Powered by a potent blend of key ingredients, including Sea Buckthorn Extract renowned for its rich vitamin C content, Deep Vita C Pads actively help to improve post-acne marks, dark spots, and even out your skin tone. Notably, the vibrant yellow color of these pads comes naturally from the sea buckthorn extract, ensuring a visually appealing and wholesome product..
Elevate your skincare routine and experience with the transformative power of Deep Vita C Pads. Unveil a brighter, more radiant complexion while enjoying the added benefit of improved post-acne marks. Rediscover confidence in your skin and embrace the radiance you deserve.

How To Use

1. Start with a clean face.
Before using the toner pad, cleanse your face with a cleanser to remove any makeup, dirt, or impurities.
2. Retrieve a pad.
Take out one facial toner pad from the packaging.
Make sure to close the package promptly to prevent the other pads from drying out.
3. Apply the toner pad to your face.
Simply swipe the toner-soaked pad across your face, using gentle and upward motions.
Start from the center of your face and move outward.
Be cautious around the eye area, and avoid getting the products into your eyes.
4. Pay attention to problem areas.
If you have areas that require extra attention, you can focus on those areas by applying a bit more pressure with the toner pad or leaving them on for 5-10 minute.
5. Follow up with your skincare routine.
If you are done using the pad, discard the used pad. After the toner residue has absorbed into the skin, proceed with the rest of your skincare routine, including serums, moisturizers, or sunscreen.

Key Ingredients
Deep Vita C Pad Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, Water(Aqua), Methyl Gluceth-20, Methylpropanediol, Niacinamide, Glycereth-26, Methyl Gluceth-10, Polyglycerin-3, 1,2-Hexanediol, Gluconolactone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cymbopogon Martini Oil , Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil , Adenosine, Butylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Extract , Lactobacillus/Lemon Peel Ferment Extract, Geraniol, Citronellol, Coptis Japonica Extract, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Seed Extract, Litsea Cubeba Fruit Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Allantoin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lactic Acid, Glucose, Beta-Glucan, Linalool, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Cetyl Palmitate, Ubiquinone, Polysorbate 80, Sorbitan Stearate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Ergothioneine, Hesperidin, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-10

The formula is lightweight, absorbs quickly, and leaves the skin feeling clean without any sticky or greasy finish. On the downside, it may not be hydrating enough for dry skin types, and those with sensitive skin might need to check for any ingredients that could cause irritation. Overall, it’s a good toner for daily use, especially for those looking for something simple and refreshing. Rating: 4/5
